website_summaries.verdict: Ground organic flaxseed with great nutty taste. Made from proprietary milling process produces finely sliced seeds vs. crushing them to help prevent loss of nutrients.
pros: Rich amount of omega-3 fatty acids with no preservatives
USDA certified organic and non-GMO project verified
Comes in large plastic bag for maximum freshness
Great in smoothies, shakes, and just about anything else
Good amount of lignans to possibly help with hormonal balance
cons: Must be kept refrigerated to keep from going rancid
Has a gravel-like texture and some seeds appeared to not be ground
Seal on bag doesn't close properly

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT FOR ENERGY BALLS! {Recipe Below}
customer_reviews.text: I use this flax to make Energy Balls and they're delicious! My kids love them as well. Super healthy & we have replaced our purchasing of granola bars which is even greater :-) 1/2 cup peanut butter (or any nut butter) 1/3 cup honey 1 tsp. Vanilla - Mix above together then add: 1 cup Old Fashioned Oats 2/3 cup coconut 1/2 cup flaxseed meal 6 Tbsp. mini chocolate chips - Combine all and let chill before rolling into balls. Store in air tight container in refrigerator. Enjoy!!
customer_reviews.author: L. Mathewson

customer_reviews.title: I started drinking fruit and veggie smoothies about a year ...
customer_reviews.text: I started drinking fruit and veggie smoothies about a year ago. I put 2 tablespoons of this ground flaxseed in every day... The results - I have lost 14 lbs to date and my cholesterol has dropped from 230 a year ago to a whopping 144 now! Blood pressure was a little elevated and is now completely normal. I can honestly tell you all that I will be doing this for the rest of my life!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dave B.

customer_reviews.title: Multiple health benefits
customer_reviews.text: I use 2 tsp a day in my oatmeal and can see a difference in my hair, skin and nails. Shiny and strong! Among the other awesome health benefits of flaxseed, one of the best thing is having a super good poop every day like clockwork.
customer_reviews.author: wonderdogmom

customer_reviews.title: Flaxseed had gone rancid
customer_reviews.text: My partner and I had upset stomachs every time we had smoothies made with this flaxseed from Amazon, so much so that we've developed a dietary sensitivity towards flaxseed in general. We previously had no issues with ground flaxseed purchased from our local Wholefoods. After speaking to a nutritionist, we learned that ground flaxseed can go rancid very quickly, so I'm suspicious about how long ours had been sitting in Amazon's inventory. If you want ground flaxseed, either grind it yourself or purchase from a trusted supplier and store in your freezer.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Good quality ground flax seed, refrigerate after opening
customer_reviews.text: This was a good price for a good quality product. I use ground flaxseed often, in baking, in my oatmeal, in yogurts, to add fiber and protein. Very healthy for you! Please be aware you need to refrigerate ground flaxseed after opening! I do recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Maly123Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: YES! FINALLY!
customer_reviews.text: ground flaxseed has changed my life. I've been suffering chronic constipation for 5 years and now that I'm putting a tea spoon of this in my smoothie/juice/whatever every day, I'm going once or even twice every day! It's unreal but flax has made my body feel so much better. I can't say enough about the benefits of flaxseed!
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: you're obviously trying to eat better.. but who knew that this would actually ...
customer_reviews.text: If you buy this, you're obviously trying to eat better.. but who knew that this would actually become something I craved? I love this stuff. It's like a nutty topping that you can put on oatmeal, yogurt, ice cream.. I even sprinkle some on my peanut butter and banana sandwiches. I'll be eating this stuff for life! It's great!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Highest Quality - Add to your favorite salad or smoothie
customer_reviews.text: I add this to my protein smoothie and yogurt in the morning. Really the best brand out there. Give this a try and add it to your favorite salad or smoothie.
customer_reviews.author: Tech Junkie

customer_reviews.title: Expiration date was Six months after sales date
customer_reviews.text: I expected the expiration date to be at Least 12 months after sales date - Wrong! ONLY Six months after the sales date. Amazon should NOT sell items that expire less than 12 months after the sale. MOST products have an average expiration date of 16 months -24 months have the sale date. It looks like they were unloaded old product onto me, the unsuspecting buyer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Weightlifters! Good fats & Regularity
customer_reviews.text: I mix a heaping tablespoon of this in my protein shakes 2x per day. The seeds are course ground so you'll definitely know their in your shake- doesn't bother me though. Source of good fats and helps me with regularity. This 24oz bag is the best value by far.
customer_reviews.author: J. T. Turner

customer_reviews.title: Sand in the product.
customer_reviews.text: The product is fine otherwise. However, the amount of sand is grinding my teeth away. I had to stop using it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Yuk!
customer_reviews.text: Made us all sick, including our 4 dogs. Not sure what’s all in this but no ones stomach could handle even 1/4 tsp. Also taste is terrible
customer_reviews.author: Deni

customer_reviews.title: Doing the job!
customer_reviews.text: I mix 2 Tbsp with some water and drink it down. It has helped my digestion issues a LOT. I will be buying this on a regular basis.
customer_reviews.author: April Stiles

customer_reviews.title: Love it. I have had chronic constipation for 15-20 ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I have had chronic constipation for 15-20 years and just one TBSP per day in my oatmeal or smoothie keeps me regular every day. Before I would have a bowel movement every 2 days which had me grumpy, fatigued, and bloated! I'm glad they have it in ground form because I hate the seeds!
customer_reviews.author: Eric Richter

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality product and cheaper than the grocery store. I bought this for the fact that it contains lignans which help with hormonal balance. I take it in combination with a few other things for hormonal acne. It also has a nice nutty flavor so its easy to incorporate it into a dish. I hope this review helps you! Give it a thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Loves to shop

customer_reviews.title: Love this, simplest way to add extra nutrition - ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this, simplest way to add extra nutrition - just add a teaspoon to my yogurts. Also, great in overnight oats mixed in mason jar: 2-3 table spoons oats, tea spoon flax seed, teaspoon chia, a splash of milk first and then add any type of yogurt serving (flavored or not). If using unflavored yogurt a bit of honey can be added. :)
customer_reviews.author: Rococo

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Love this brand. Used flaxseed religiously for many years to help with my genetic predisposition toward high cholesterol. I don't want to go back on medicine for it, so I decided to give flaxseed, in different forms, another chance! Diet and exercise alone doesn't work for me, as well as many others. I think I might stick with this brand for awhile. Plus, the price was reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Johnson

customer_reviews.title: I don't know why. Each time I spill it ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why. Each time I spill it over my milk and eat it, it makes me very very sick - I will end up in the toilet throwing up. This has happened twice, so I stopped eating it.
customer_reviews.author: Li, Huihua

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: We received the product on 7/28/16. Expired date on product is 8/6/16. This product is literally expired and should not be sold.
customer_reviews.author: Disappointed

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: This is a nutritional power house. Im mainly taking it for my milk supply for breastfeeding but I recommend it for everyone just for the omegas in here. I add some in a blender when I make smoothies for my family. I eat it sprinkled on top of yogurt with berries and a drizzle of honey. The options are endless. The flax seeds are ground up very finely which makes it a breeze for drinks or add ons.
customer_reviews.author: Blushed22

customer_reviews.title: AND ATT A GREAT PRICE! AND THIS IS A UNBIASED TRUE OPINION
customer_reviews.text: LOWERED MY CHOLESTEROL AND BLOOD PRESSURE NATURALLY, AND ATT A GREAT PRICE! AND THIS IS A UNBIASED TRUE OPINION..
customer_reviews.author: 2007 BEACHBUM

customer_reviews.title: poor grade product
customer_reviews.text: at first look it seemed to be ok, however after looking closer (and having consumed some of it in a shake) i noticed the taste was off. I have used ground flax seeds for years in smoothies, shakes and other recipes so when I got a taste of this product I could instantly tell it was not right. It had a rancid taste. Further more it was not properly ground as I found many (at least 25-30) whole seeds among the ground in one tablespoon measured). I certainly will not purchase this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Yummy Healthy Addition To Your Diet
customer_reviews.text: Another great seed to obtain your Omega 3s and diet fiber. I like this brand because it's organic, and the ground state provides with maximum absorption. Flaxseeds have multiple benefits but please don't expect to see immediate results with one bag of consuption. Try to incorporate it in your diet at least one or two tablespoons a day starting with adding it in your oatmeal. I like buying it from amazon because you get the best price available and I never had any issues so far. It's best to keep this product sealed and when the warm heather comes around store it in the refrigerator.
customer_reviews.author: Petros

customer_reviews.title: Lowers my blood pressure big time.
customer_reviews.text: I mix 2 TBSP with yogurt or cereal each day. Lowered my Blood Pressure 20 points points systolic and ten points diastolic. I may ask my Doc if can cut my BP meds.
customer_reviews.author: Art

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not an even grind
customer_reviews.text: The grind isn't even is the only problem. There are big pieces, whole seeds, and well ground pieces. Still tastes good, and works pretty well, but bobs red mill had a much more even grind/ no whole seeds. We make flax seed cookies, and these ones have some seeds that get stuck in your teeth vs. bobs where it's all even in size.
customer_reviews.author: C. Moeller

customer_reviews.title: flaxseed is so good for hair growth
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my smoothie as a thickener. it's organic and the price is so reasonable. flaxseed is so good for hair growth! i really like this product.
customer_reviews.author: Clean eating girl

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but check the bag integrity as soon as you receive it
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is good, the first bag I ordered was fine, but the 2nd bag that I just received today was sliced in 2 places, apparently in the warehouse or in the processing facility or both, because there's no way to have done it when opening the box when I received it. I put in a return/replace, hopefully that bag will be fine. Otherwise, I'll have to find a brand that comes in a hard plastic container instead or buy locally. Took 1 star off for the careless processing, not for the product itself.
customer_reviews.author: CAM

customer_reviews.title: No Expiration Date!!
customer_reviews.text: The one star is only because my item arrived with the expiration date rubbed off! Am I using an expired product? No way to tell! How irritating!!!
customer_reviews.author: PhillyGee

customer_reviews.title: Who looks forward to flaxseed? I do now!
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty sure no one ever says "hey what else can I use ground flaxseed on" because we probably likley mix it into food because we know it's good for us. Not this, I look forward to finding ways to use it. I bought another brand last night and nutritionally it's the same but the taste and texture are not. This stuff is likely a finely ground but coating and makes yogurt and oatmeal and protein shakes delicious. The other brand cost about $3.50 per pound. This is about$4.50 a pound but truly worth it.
customer_reviews.author: L. Lederer

customer_reviews.title: Quality Content in a Defective Ziplock
customer_reviews.text: I have been subscribing to this product for a while. I am happy with the content. Yet the the resealable container has been defective repeatedly. The ziplock should be durable enough to sustain repeated opening and closing over a certain period. This last bag ziplock broke after a couple of weeks. This time the ziplock broke at the second time I opened it. one side of the zip detached from the bag, effectively breaking the seal. This is a trivial yet critical quality control issue. Dear manufacturer, please consider using different ziplock product please~.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Twain

customer_reviews.title: Fresh ingredients and a delicious taste
customer_reviews.text: His flaxseed mixes really well with protein powder for a good superfood pickmeup in the morning. I’m not a big fan of nuts but this flavor is actually quite delicious. It helps protein powder taste less manufactured and more organic. I suggest adding this to your morning meal to help get an energy boost throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Bishop

customer_reviews.title: BestByDateTooSoon
customer_reviews.text: Usually I buy my flaxseed meal from a certain supplier. This time I tried a new supplier. However, the "best by" date is only November--barely eight months away. My first supplier's product had a much longer "shelf life". So, I am disappointed in this one from Spectrum. I have not opened the bag yet but will refrigerate or freeze it soon.
customer_reviews.author: Tritondives

customer_reviews.title: Great product overall
customer_reviews.text: I put this in my oatmeal every morning it tastes great and helps give the oatmeal a thicker consistency. The only knock against this is the packaging. The zip seal at the top tends to pull away from the bag, thereby eliminating any sealing at all. The package instructions state to seal the bag to maintain freshness, but the seal is mediocre. I will absolutely keep buying it and dumping it into a zip top bag. If Spectrum Essential wanted to improve anything, improve the container.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J

customer_reviews.title: Like the mild nutty flavor, but try the version with mixed berries!
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about what this would taste like, but I've been putting three heaping teaspoons into my cereal every morning and I actually enjoy the mild nutty flavor it adds. UPDATE: I have moved on to, which is even better!
customer_reviews.author: Roger the Lion Hearted

customer_reviews.title: First rate. It works.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best flaxseed I've found over the years. It does wonders for your digestive system. All in all, when I am eating it regularly in the recommended amount (two or three tbsp each day) I feel better than when I don't eat it. Subtle, but real.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Can’t Go Wrong With This Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: #Good #Crunchy flavor #Very fresh. Another reviewer (L. Matheson) provided a recipe for snack balls using the Flax Seeds...omg...soooo good! I made them, adding chopped walnuts. Flavors melded together beautifully...the Flax Seed didn’t overpower - just perfect flavor. The Flax Seed is also good on salads. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: JB0210

customer_reviews.title: Rancid, bitter tasting - spoiled.
customer_reviews.text: Rancid and horrible bitter smell. I have been using Flaxseed (and Chia seeds) in my smoothies for years, and never received a bad batch until this week, both of them were bad. Bizarre. I have always used Spectrum Flaxseed purchased on Amazon, and this was the first time I had a problem. Really frustrating when you are waiting on them, and then they are bad so you can't use.
customer_reviews.author: JeninFlorida

customer_reviews.title: Drop you blood pressure to normal or lower in weeks😇👌
customer_reviews.text: Great products, we'll packed.😁 i been on flaxseed for about 8 weeks. Dropped by Bp. To 110/79 i take 2 tablespoons with my almond milk& protein shake. Wii buy again. It really does work on you blood presure. Pulse i do a keto diet with exercise 4 days a week.
customer_reviews.author: Rich B.P.😁

customer_reviews.title: The best available on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I've used this ground flaxseed almost daily for about two years. Both before and during this period I've tried a number of other brands from groceries and Amazon. I use it baking and add it to my oatmeal most days. This is by far the best in terms of taste (not much taste to it, which is ideal) and fineness of the grind. The latter is most important, as so many other brands are too gritty to add just plan to cereals (doesn't really matter for baking).
customer_reviews.author: fanofhistory

customer_reviews.title: Something wrong with it
customer_reviews.text: I just opened the package which had 6 months before expiration. It tasted so bitter and awful. Had to throw the whole bag out. Will never buy again.
customer_reviews.author: K. Zhao

customer_reviews.title: Not completely ground
customer_reviews.text: When I opened this I was disappointed to see that this isn't very finely ground. In fact, I could see whole flaxseeds in there. You don't get all the benefits from flaxseed unless it is ground. Not much point in buying something that's supposed to ground if you have to put it in the Vitamix to completely grind it all up.
customer_reviews.author: V. Pack

customer_reviews.title: Healthy and flavorful!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I put a couple of scoops on my oatmeal with honey, blueberries, and cinnamon! It's delicious and healthy. My cholesterol has gone down, along with exercise and lifestyle change! 👍🏽 Keep it in the refrigerator to stay fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Quality, Organic Ground Flaxseed
customer_reviews.text: It always smells and tastes fresh. I like adding natural bulk and fiber into our diets, and the Omega oils is a great plus. We store in the fridge and add to non-dairy yogurt. When mixed with Key Lime flavor yogurt, it's reminiscent of key lime pie and pie crust.
customer_reviews.author: For Real

customer_reviews.title: Amazing taste and quality, poor packaging
customer_reviews.text: Best tasting flax seeds I’ve ever tried! I eat them on a smashed banana every morning for breakfast and this is by far the best brand I’ve ever had. Only thing that was disappointing is that the zipper on the bag broke when I opened it. Flax seeds can spoil pretty quickly so I had to repackage. Overall I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte McCall

customer_reviews.title: Healthy and easy to eat
customer_reviews.text: This is great to sprinkle in cereal, yogurt, or other bakes good recipes. I love that I am getting the extra fiber, plus the omega fats. The taste is fine, and the fact that it is ground makes it easy to add into other food items. I keep it refrigerated to keep it fresh. Good buy and decent price.
customer_reviews.author: C. Luis

customer_reviews.title: Needs better quality control
customer_reviews.text: Used in several smoothies and found grit (stone?, glass?) Discontinued use.
customer_reviews.author: networkuser

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: Great value! We add these to our breakfast smoothies and coffee and have been pleased. They do not have a strong flavor so it blends well hot or cold. The bag contains a generous portion for the cost which we love. Be mindful the suggestions are to refrigerate after opening which i missed at first.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Philhart

customer_reviews.title: I love the flavor and health benefits of this flaxseed!
customer_reviews.text: I use a tablespoon of Spectrum Essentials ground flaxseed in my protection shakes daily. I absolutely love the freshness of this product and the nutty flavor it adds to my shakes. I have also added this ground flaxseed to dishes I've cooked for the extra health benefits flaxseed gives you. I will never be without it. Just remember to refrigerate after opening. This keeps it as fresh as the moment you opened it!
customer_reviews.author: Gail McCoy

customer_reviews.title: Mixes well
customer_reviews.text: This mixes well for me. This is my second order and I will continue to purchase this brand at Amazon. The price is right, the quality is good. It mixes well although you still need to drink it right away or it will settle. The flavor is fine for mixing with water, juice, yogurt. I even put it in my protein shakes sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Hummingbird

customer_reviews.title: good except short expiration date
customer_reviews.text: 3-4 tea spoons per day. It works except minus 1 star for short expiration date. I ordered this in Feb, 2019 and the bag expiration date is Jul, 2019 which means I have 5 month to finish the product. I think my other brands has a longer expiration date.
customer_reviews.author: Brian H.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and Good for You!
customer_reviews.text: We use flax oil on nearly everything from a local farmer who presses it for us. Flax is one of the 5 essential "parent" oils, not a derivative. We add a large tablespoon of this milled flax seed to our fruit bowl every day. Great taste and, it's a great fiber eliminating the need for any expensive drug store fiber products.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas L. Eaton

customer_reviews.title: Tastes good, but not milled sufficiently
customer_reviews.text: This tastes good, but it is not milled sufficiently for my tastes. I am using it in bread and there are lots of seeds. I had to grind it in a spice mill to get a better texture for baking. I'm sure there are people who are fine with the seeds, but I prefer a finer grind.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia NR

customer_reviews.title: I do not like this product because I mix it with other fibers ...
customer_reviews.text: I do not like this product because I mix it with other fibers to make a drink - this flax seed is not ground fine enough to soak up the water the way I want it to. If you were cooking with it, it would be okay - If you are making a smoothie, it might be alright as well.
customer_reviews.author: M.M.

customer_reviews.title: or other veg along with kelp and enzymes and her coat is so super shiny and she's very very healthy
customer_reviews.text: I give our 6 month giant schnauzer about a 1/2 tablespoon of this each day in pureed pumpkin, plain yogurt, or other veg along with kelp and enzymes and her coat is so super shiny and she's very very healthy. We also add this to smoothies and oatmeal for ourselves.
customer_reviews.author: Root

customer_reviews.title: The Packaging Now Sucks!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff and have purchased it 26 times now. That said, the zip lock in the bag used to last till it the bag was empty. I would need to clean it out with a knife from time to time, but that was to be expected. But now I am lucky to open it what seems like two or three times before the zip lock comes loose from the bag. From then on its bag clip time. The sad part is you don't always notice it right away, and there goes the freshness!
customer_reviews.author: Mike P

customer_reviews.title: Healthy Addition to Shakes
customer_reviews.text: I put one tablespoon (the serving size is two tbsp.) of this product in my green shake in order to get the benefit of Omega-3 fatty acids and fiber. I keep the bag in the refrigerator for freshness. Amazon offers a great price for this product, so I will continue to order it.
customer_reviews.author: Dreyna

customer_reviews.title: Very healthy and did not change the taste of my smoothie...
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time having ground flaxseed or having flaxseed in general. I wasn't sure what to expect and I can't really tell how taste as I'm using it in my smoothie and it did not alter the taste. My smoothie still remains yummy and the flaxseed is very healthy so I was pleased that I was able to add it to my smoothie and I didn't lose the yum factor.
customer_reviews.author: Nicky7k

customer_reviews.title: Great for my digestive health
customer_reviews.text: My spouse makes a lot of white rice which I have avoided since my teens. Living together I started to gain weight and feel pretty heavy, constipated and bloated. My monthly period was miserable but adding this product to my serving of rice has made my tummy much happier.
customer_reviews.author: Millenial Snowflake

customer_reviews.title: NOT well ground!
customer_reviews.text: After 8 years of using ground flax seed, we moved to Florida and ordered this brand. Tastes great, but, to our surprise, it is not fully ground! We wonder if the partial hard, undigestible sees shells diminish the absorbability of the nutrients. So we went back to our former brand which rates, for us, 5 stars. Or, this could be just a matter if individual preference if indeed it is equally digestible.
customer_reviews.author: Gayle Delaney

customer_reviews.title: Great value,  fresh and tasty!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because flaxseed is the top phytoestrogen and I needed to supplement my diet as I'm going through menopause. The size was great for the price, it's a big package. The flavor is good and not overwhelming. It's a bit of a rough texture but I put it in my smoothies and they're so good but be warned, it will add some texture but I like that. I would definitely buy from this seller again!
customer_reviews.author: GiGi

customer_reviews.title: Awfully oily, can only use in very small amounts
customer_reviews.text: I found this ground flaxseed nearly takes over everything you add it to, both in flavor (not great) and it's so oily. I'm keeping it in my freezer to keep it fresh, but I don't seem to be using much of it. Maybe used in very small amounts it would add good nutrition to my dishes, but now I'm wishing that I bought a much small package to try first.
customer_reviews.author: ttmadison

customer_reviews.title: Just awesome value - great improvement for digestion
customer_reviews.text: I bought this about 4 months ago and the flaxseed is still in awesome quality. Taking a teaspoon with some fruits (usually bananas) and lots of water every day and my digestion has improved a lot. I very much like the taste, which is nicely nutty and hasn't changed in the about 4 months while the packaging is open. Not a bit of rancid taste. Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: tasty with yogurt
customer_reviews.text: This is high quality flax seed. I think it taste like finely ground pecans. I put it in my low carb yogurt. I think it taste great and I am really picky. I am glad there is a superfood that I actually like!
customer_reviews.author: Terrilynn75672

customer_reviews.title: Helps make great keto crackers
customer_reviews.text: Since going keto this is a staple to have in the house for keto baking. Use this particular one adding 3 tablespoons This to 1 cup of Lupita Sweet flour 1 teaspoon baking powder 1/3 warm water 1/3 avocado oil mix roll out poke with a fork cut with a pizza cutter sprinkle with everything but the bagel and some sea salt on top and cook 375 for 10 minutes turn over it have to best keto crackers ever
customer_reviews.author: Iva

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: This is well milled. Great taste in cooked and uncooked foods. Has lowered my triglycerides by about 25 points. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Terri Tway

customer_reviews.title: Low Taste and Texture - Excellent for Smoothies
customer_reviews.text: Very little taste and works excellent in my Spinach breakfast smoothie designed to be high in fiber and protein as well as rich in vitamins. Barely notice it is even in the drink, very little texture, blends nicely.
customer_reviews.author: RARE Technologies

customer_reviews.title: Rancid product
customer_reviews.text: This product was rancid when I opened it. Didn’t realize until I made a shake with it and tasted it. These products have a shirt shelf life and must be kept cool. It seems that wasn’t the case and it was left in the heat or left on a shelf for too long. Back to the Whole Foods brand I go.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Love the taste
customer_reviews.text: Ophthalmologist suggested as a treatment for dry eye. Not sure it is doing that and not sure I am using enough. I put it every day on my cereal and I love the nutty taste. Will continue to buy because Flax is a good source of omega 3 fats. It's also great for thickening foods so they don't fall apart in the oven. I make a lot of bean burgers.
customer_reviews.author: Dona B. Mathis

customer_reviews.title: From $8.56 in May to $12.81 in July!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The increased price on this product is outrageous! $4.25 in only 2 months!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Bautista

customer_reviews.title: Healthy
customer_reviews.text: Flaxseed is extremely good for you, but you have to consume it ground. Otherwise, it won't get absorbed. This product delivers with having the seeds pre-ground. Flaxseeds are very high in Omega 3 fatty acids. It's a must have for anyone who avoids animal products for ethical or environmental reasons.
customer_reviews.author: Manny Fresh

customer_reviews.title: Fresh and nutty flavor
customer_reviews.text: I got this so I could include flax seeds in my diet. They are supposed to be an anti-cancer food and nobody wants cancer although if we live long enough 1 of 2 of us will have it. This tastes good in smoothies and also is tasty sprinkled on a peanut butter sandwich. It has such a nice nutty flavor I'm going to see how many other foods it will be good in, like oatmeal and brown rice.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Frang

customer_reviews.title: Inert Gas?
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time that I have bought flaxseed meal. It seems like a very good product but I have two challenges. First, what exactly does it mean by, "flushed with inert gas?" What the heck is that, nitrogen or ? Second, it doesn't tell you what type of flaxseed. Is it golden or ? Because of the gas issue and the lack of information on what type it is, I am giving it three stars.
customer_reviews.author: Dluman

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: I have this on subscribe & save for 2+ years now. I like that its organic and grounded. Havent tried any other brand so cant compare. I like it. Use it for my overnight oats and steel cut oats. I do put it in the fridge after opening. I put some in a small glass jar so i dont need to constantly open and sealing the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Bay

customer_reviews.title: effective
customer_reviews.text: very good to keep the regularity. need to be careful with the dosage cuz it could loose you too much, so need to try different measurement untill you get the right amount for your stomach
customer_reviews.author: eat4me

customer_reviews.title: Easy way to up the nutrition in my food!
customer_reviews.text: I keep this in the freezer and like to add it to smoothies. When adding to smoothies it makes the texture gritty, but if you add a banana or two as well, it balances out really well. I am looking forward to finding new ways to incorporate this into my diet.
customer_reviews.author: gemini lunar star

customer_reviews.title: Delicious, cost effective, convenient
customer_reviews.text: Great price, great taste, ground (which is the requisite way to eat flax-seed for those who don't know. The nutrients that flax seeds are famous for are not biologically active in non-ground flax seed!!!), cheap, bulk buy, subscribe and save eligible. Can't go wrong!
customer_reviews.author: Charlie B.

customer_reviews.title: Not fully sealed
customer_reviews.text: I've bought this item before with no problems, but this time I received a package that was not fully sealed at the top so some of the flaxseeds had spilled out in shipping and I'm concerned about the freshness of the product. I guess I will be throwing away the package. Disappointed this time with this item.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. I am able to add quite a bit before noticing any flavor, and when I do it is a pleasant nuttiness that is a good addition to many things.
customer_reviews.author: Stilldawn

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FLAXSEED PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I always have a green drink for breakfast with protein powder and like to include a spoonful of ground flax seeds in my drink as well. I love this product. It is ground very fine and is very fresh and works great in my morning drink. There is no strong smell or taste either. I would greatly recommend this product. I will definitely order this again.
customer_reviews.author: DEBBIEDOLL

customer_reviews.title: The sticker covered a warning that this package needs to be refridgerated
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know this had to be refridgerated and it was because a sticker this came with covered that information. My flaxseed went bad and it was still ingested. Really bad idea to put sticker on that area. Not all flaxseed needs to be refridgeratd I thought and the other bags I get don't say they need to be.
customer_reviews.author: Tech.Tennis

customer_reviews.title: Great Zip top bag
customer_reviews.text: Best part is the zip top bag, the product was fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Natures Retreat

customer_reviews.title: I enjoy this product and add it to my oatmeal or ...
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy this product and add it to my oatmeal or other hot cereals as well as pancakes and waffles I make at home. It adds nutrition to these items and I feel as though I am working actively to maintain good health. I am now 78 and in very good health so it well may be helping. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Goingstrong

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: I tried this for the first time with my protein shake. Has a great nutty taste. I bought this to see if it helps to reduce my triglycerides which are in the 400 range. Was prescribed a prescription to reduce triglyceride, but I want to take something natural. Will report back after a month of being on the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Short Expiration Date
customer_reviews.text: I received the product today, and just found out that the expiration date is in September. I think they sell products that have expiration date less than 6 months, which is bad.
customer_reviews.author: Xuefan

customer_reviews.title: High Quality and High Nutrition
customer_reviews.text: This flaxseed is specially cut which makes the texture very palatable. It tastes great as well. I have been eating two tablespoons daily for over a year and have significantly reduced my cholesterol, have great digestion, and lost the last stubborn 12 pounds that I couldn't seem to shake. I have subscribed to this product and hope it continues to be offered here on Amazon. A bonus is the fantastic price! Thank you Spectrum Organics for a superb product!
customer_reviews.author: Gina T.

customer_reviews.title: Healthy ingredients - lignans, omegas & fiber
customer_reviews.text: Love the fiber richness & great Omega3:Omega6 ratio; the lignans qty is great but could be better (-1 star). The Premium Gold brand has slightly lower Omega3:Omega6 ratio but much more lignans qty. Nonetheless, this brand is almost equally as good & unit priced about the same as the other brand.
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: I like Spectrum products
customer_reviews.text: I like Spectrum products. The ground flaxseed is better for me than the seeds. I use this in my green smoothie recipes and in my seed bread recipe. I am going to use them to make my salmon burgers since I can't eat dairy and eggs at the moment. I read that they can be used as a binder to hold the salmon flakes together. The quality is good enough to use as a topping on desserts too.
customer_reviews.author: ShoesGalore

customer_reviews.title: Bloated and gassy
customer_reviews.text: I add 2 tablespoons to my oatmeal for breakfast and this brand made me SO bloated and made my stomach hurt 5-6 hours after consuming. It also made my LO super gassy after nursing and I could tell his tummy was uncomfortable too. I used a different brand before that didn’t make me feel this way but it was out of stock, so I went with this one. I definitely won’t finish the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Used in oatmeal
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement for another product that apparently is no longer being produced. It states on package that it has a "nutty flavor". I mix it with ground chia seed, honey and almonds in my oatmeal. I add banana & blueberries to my wife's oatmeal. The combination taste great.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Asaro

customer_reviews.title: Hides perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I add 2 tbsp to a full blender of fruit & veggie smoothie and it hides perfectly. Looking forward to increased milk production and health benefits!
customer_reviews.author: Lori L.

customer_reviews.title: Good flaxseed for Protein Shakes or mixing with Kefir
customer_reviews.text: I like the texture of this flaxseed. It's not a fine powder - the grind is a little more coarse so it's a great add to protein shakes or to mix with kefir for breakfast. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: KathyDianeLive

customer_reviews.title: It has a nice subtle taste and mixes well into other liquids
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my morning smoothies every week! It has a nice subtle taste and mixes well into other liquids. The bag is resealable and easy to use over multiple weeks. I put this product on a subscription plan which also allows me to save money.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Champ

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product
customer_reviews.text: I use to use the whole flax seeds and then I read that your body does not digest the whole seeds very well. In fact it says that most pass right through you. So I decided to try this and it is fantastic. I use this in my Greek yogurt and it works great. I will be using this product for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Stengle

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: Got this without fully researching ahead of time which is unfortunate. For those wondering, they suggest you do not use this product while pregnant. That advice comes from my doctors as well as several sources on the internet. On the plus side, I can use this soon enough and my husband does use it. It's harder to work into things than I thought it would be, and he hasn't really noticed any difference in his body, but it is a good price and a good product I think.
customer_reviews.author: Caity

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: We love this ground flax seed. We even give it to our dogs. They love it and get quite excited when we open the package to put it in their food. My husband takes it for his digestion and says it works very well. We like it because it is natural. We even got my mom to start using it. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Olson

customer_reviews.title: very fresh and tasty
customer_reviews.text: Freshest available. My coconut bread was turning out fantastic while others was not. We found that they were buying inferior flaxseed meal and it had a rancid taste. This meal is always very mild with a slight nutty flavor. Will definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: honeydidn't

customer_reviews.title: Delicious Flaxseed
customer_reviews.text: Had been buying Bob's brand which is a prime pantry item and I didn't have an order ready and was out so I decided to give this brand a try and am glad I did. It has a great texture and taste. I use a sprinkle in almost everything I make from biscuits to a coco bark.
customer_reviews.author: P.

customer_reviews.title: I love this product but am disappointed with the package it ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this product but am disappointed with the package it has a self seal container but the one I received doe not close. Not the worst thing but annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: I really like this Flaxseed
customer_reviews.text: I really like this Flaxseed. The taste doesn't bother me like so of the others brands that I've tried. I put it in my smoothie every morning. It is very healthy with the omegas and it is supposed to work in the gut.
customer_reviews.author: golden

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great. You can pretty much sneak it into anything you're cooking. I do and no one's noticed. I originally got it for myself to help with my milk supply. Which it did! But there are many other healthy benefits to this also. I usually just add it to my cereal in the morning and it blends pretty decent.
customer_reviews.author: Runnin'w/scissors

product_meta.title: Spectrum Essentials Organic Ground Flaxseed, 24 Ounce (Pack of 1)
product_meta.description: Style:Ground Flaxseed| Size:24 Ounce (Pack of 1)Spectrum Essentials Organic Ground Premium Flaxseed Delivers the Great Taste and Nutritional Benefits That Flaxseed Is Known For. Each Serving of Organic Ground Premium Flaxseed Has 4 G of Dietary Fiber and 2.
feature_bullets: Ground organic flaxseed with great nutty taste
Rich in Omega 3 (ALA) fatty acids. No Preservatives
USDA certified organic & Non GMO Project verified

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
